Key Match Events: Endrick broke the all-time international football record by scoring at Wembley for club or country at the age of 17
Pre-Game Insights: England struggled to lay a glove on Brazil's inexperienced visitors, who had lost their last three games of 2023
Domenico Tedesco's side were also left to rue a tepid offensive display on Ireland's turf
England's first defeat at their headquarters in over four years
England's first loss since bowing out of the 2022 World Cup at the hands of France
Post-Match Reflections: Southgate was able to reflect on several positives from his side's display, even if a lack of cutting edge was a glaring blot on the notebook
Gareth Southgate discusses England performance, Kane injury after Brazil defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's form (all competitions): W, W, W, W, D, L
Belgium's form (all competitions): W, W, D, W, W, D
Others: England possible starting lineup: Pickford; Konsa, Stones, Branthwaite, Gomez; Mainoo, Rice; Bowen, Bellingham, Rashford; Toney
Belgium possible starting lineup: Kaminski; Meunier, Faes, Theate, Deman; Tielemans, Onana, Vermeeren; Bakayoko, Lukaku, Doku
